EmailTemplate.description: To be used to reject a customer request for changing email from individual to group email address
EmailTemplate.name: Email change from individual to group email address
EmailTemplate.subject: Email change from individual to group email address
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
Please note that our usage policy does not allow the sharing or updating of individual logins to shared logins and vice versa, therefore, we are unable to fulfil your request on this occassion.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
